name: Plushies (RUBIKA)
description:
Plushies is a third-person action open world where you play as the leader of a group of plushes who’s most precious belonging, the machine giving life to plushies, has been stolen by the minions of a previously unknown evil conqueror. Having never even known any form of violence, the plushies will quickly learn to tear apart their opponents to reconquer the machine from the paws of this relentless ennemy.

Graduation Video Game School : RUBIKA (France)
Year : 2021
Platform: PC 
Engine: Unreal Engine 4
Number of player: 1
Genre: Beat 'em Up / Exploration

Credits

PLUSHIES is a student graduation project made by 10 students from RUBIKA, France :

  • Victoire DECOOL / Environment Artist
  • Mathis MARCHAL / Lead Game Artist & Level Artist & VFX Artist
  • Pauline SION / Artistic Director & Character Artist
  • Capucine TOUSSAINT / Environment Artist & Producer
  • Léo BOUDOIN / Game & Fight Designer
  • Emilie REINEKE / Lead Game Designer & AI Programmer
  • Loïc VOISIN / Technical Animator
  • Axel CHATELAIN / Creative Director & Gameplay Programmer
  • David DURAND / Lead Programmer & System and UI Programmer
  • Nils VANDAMME / Level Designer
